item.title: Wechat_aud2mp3
item.description:
Come a request that merge the audios in the wechat to a file of mp3. The following is the steps, after more than a week’s study…

  1. get the raw data files via itunes backup. Note that here is based on iphone setting.

    • backup by itunes without encrypted, removing profile in general setting.
    • use iExpoler app to get the backup files. There is an “Audio” folder which contains the aud files. The directory is: App/com.tencent.xin/Documents/20d…/Audio
    • find . -name "*.aud" -newermt 2019-06-13 ! -newermt 2019-06-14 | xargs -I{} cp {} 0613

  2. transfer the aud files to mp3 files

    • ./converter.sh ../../0622/4th/aud/ ../../0622/4th/mp3/ mp3

  3. merge to a whole mp3 file

    • make a list: ls *.mp3 | xargs -t -I{} echo file \'{}\' >> mylist.txt
    • concate to a file: ffmpeg -f concat -i mylist.txt -c copy output.mp3

Reference:

  1. https://www.zhihu.com/question/30112442
  2. https://kronopath.net/blog/extracting-audio-messages-from-wechat/
  3. https://www.jianshu.com/p/03c49fe1b20b

item.title: Install_hugo_gitpage
item.description:
The first blog in this site is natural about how to install Hugo in Git Page. Although a lot of articles are about this and even though I also read other articles, it is important to me that to record the steps, not only for the need of reinstall in the future, but for the recording itself, which is the recreation that help my mind reborn.

install hugo

  1. brew install hugo
  2. which hugo
  3. hugo version

hugo command

  1. hugo new site quickstart
    creat a new site
  2. hugo server

add to Git Page

  1. create a <username>.github.io repository in GitHub
  2. git submodule add git@github.com:zuquan/zuquan.github.io.git public
  3. run ./deploy.sh
    refer to this

misc

  1. git remote add origin https://github.com/zuquan/quickstartblog.git
    to add a local project to the GitHub
